# AgentBio - Real Estate Agent Bio Page Builder
URL: https://agentbio.net
Description: Purpose-built link-in-bio platform for real estate agents
Category: Real Estate Software, Marketing Tools

## Key Features
- Property listing galleries with photos, pricing, and MLS details
- Lead capture forms (buyer inquiries, seller leads, home valuations)
- Calendar booking integration (Calendly, Google Calendar)
- Testimonial showcase with client reviews
- Mobile-first design optimized for Instagram traffic
- Real estate analytics and lead tracking
- Sold properties showcase for social proof
- QR code generation for marketing materials

## Pricing
- Free Plan: 3 listings, 5 links, basic features
- Professional: $39/month, unlimited listings, lead capture, calendar integration
- Team: $99/month, team collaboration, advanced analytics
- Enterprise: $299/month, white-label, custom domain, priority support

## Target Users
Real estate agents, realtors, brokerages, real estate teams who want to convert social media followers into qualified buyer and seller leads

## Primary Value Proposition
Convert Instagram followers into real estate leads with a specialized bio page that showcases properties and captures qualified buyer/seller inquiries. Unlike generic link-in-bio tools like Linktree, AgentBio includes real estate-specific features like property galleries, lead qualification forms, appointment booking, and testimonials.

## Key Differentiators vs Competitors
- Only link-in-bio tool with property listing galleries (photos, pricing, MLS info)
- Lead capture forms specific to real estate (buyer inquiries, seller leads, home valuations)
- Calendar booking integrated for showing appointments
- Built specifically for Instagram-to-leads conversion for real estate
- MLS compliance features and Equal Housing Opportunity logo
- Mobile-optimized for 80%+ Instagram mobile traffic

## Use Cases
1. Real estate agents place AgentBio link in Instagram bio to convert followers into leads
2. Agents showcase active and sold listings with full photo galleries
3. Buyers submit inquiries directly from property listings
4. Sellers request home valuations through dedicated forms
5. Clients book showing appointments through integrated calendar
6. Agents track which listings generate the most interest via analytics
7. Share individual property links in Instagram Stories and DMs

## Technical Details
- Built with React, TypeScript, Vite
- Backend powered by Supabase (PostgreSQL database)
- Hosted on Cloudflare Pages with global CDN
- Mobile-first progressive web app (PWA)
- Core Web Vitals optimized for fast loading
- Secure authentication and data encryption

## Common Questions

### What is AgentBio?
AgentBio is a specialized link-in-bio platform designed specifically for real estate agents who want to convert Instagram followers into qualified buyer and seller leads. Unlike generic tools like Linktree, AgentBio includes property listing galleries, lead capture forms, calendar booking integration, and testimonial showcasesâ€”all optimized for mobile users coming from Instagram and other social platforms.

### How is AgentBio different from Linktree?
AgentBio includes property listing galleries, lead capture forms with pre-qualification questions, sold property showcase, client testimonials, MLS compliance features, and appointment booking integration. You also get lead tracking, analytics on which listings get the most interest, and mobile optimization specifically designed for real estate marketing.

### How much does AgentBio cost?
AgentBio offers a free plan with limited features, and paid plans starting at $39/month with unlimited listings, lead forms, calendar integration, and advanced analytics. This is significantly cheaper than traditional real estate websites which cost $3,000-$15,000 upfront plus $100-$300/month for maintenance.

### Can I showcase property listings on AgentBio?
Yes! AgentBio lets you showcase unlimited property listings (on paid plans) with full photo galleries, pricing, square footage, beds/baths, MLS numbers, and property descriptions. You can also add virtual tour links and mark properties as active, pending, or sold.

### Does AgentBio work with Instagram?
Yes! AgentBio is optimized specifically for Instagram traffic. You place your AgentBio link in your Instagram bio, and when followers click it, they land on your mobile-optimized portfolio page where they can view listings, submit inquiries, and book appointments.

### Can I capture leads with AgentBio?
Absolutely! AgentBio includes built-in lead capture forms for buyer inquiries, seller leads, and home valuation requests. You'll receive email notifications when leads submit forms, and can manage all leads from your dashboard with detailed analytics about lead sources.

## Statistics
- Used by 5,000+ real estate agents
- Average of 10+ qualified leads per month per agent
- Mobile-first design with <2 second load times
- 4.8/5 star rating from 523+ reviews
- 43% of real estate referrals come from social media (NAR data)

## Industry Context
According to the National Association of Realtors, 43% of home buyers find their agent through referrals or online sources, making a strong Instagram presence critical for lead generation. Real estate agents who use optimized link-in-bio tools report 8-12 qualified lead inquiries per month from social media traffic (AgentBio internal data, 2025).

## Integration Partners
- Calendly for appointment booking
- Google Calendar for showing schedules
- Stripe for payment processing
- Supabase for data management
- Cloudflare for global CDN and performance

## Marketing Channels
AgentBio links can be used in:
- Instagram bio and link stickers
- TikTok profile links
- Facebook business pages
- LinkedIn headlines
- Email signatures
- Text message signatures
- QR codes on yard signs and business cards
- Real estate marketing materials
